summary: Completed comprehensive testing of SIPARHANUD Export and Document features. All 28 backend API tests passed (100%). Frontend UI tests passed for Reports page (export Excel/PDF, filters) and Personel Detail Page (Dokumen tab with upload/download/delete).

Backend: Export personel Excel without filters
Backend: Export personel Excel with kategori filter
Backend: Export personel Excel with status filter

seed_data_creation: Test documents created during backend testing for NRP 11120017460989
context_for_next_testing_agent: Export and Document features fully tested. Backend endpoints: /api/export/personel/excel, /api/export/personel/pdf, /api/export/statistik/excel, /api/personel/{nrp}/documents (GET/POST), /api/documents/{doc_id}/download, /api/documents/{doc_id} (DELETE). Frontend: Reports page at /reports, Document tab in PersonelDetailPage. Test NRP: 11120017460989 has 3 test documents uploaded.
